title: Dyson gets those hard to reach places - Official Dyson Video
description: Dyson Ball Multifloor cleans up top, down below, and in-between.

asset.author: Dyson US
asset.hookText:
Dyson Ball Multifloor cleans up top, down below, and in-between. 

http://www.youtube.com/dysonus
https://www.facebook.com/dyson
https://twitter.com/Dyson

transcripts: My biggest cleaning challenges are reaching those really high places or even the really low places. The Dyson vacuum reaches really easily and the tough spaces that we have especially in our condo we're able to get the debris that we typically couldn't get in the past. I have some pretty tall ceilings and sometimes it's pretty difficult to get all the cobwebs because maybe the extension wand doesn't extend out all the way, but with a Dyson it's not a problem. I realized that I could reach my ceiling fan and clean up all of that dust without anybody's help. There is no hard to reach place when you own a Dyson vacuum. You just have to purchase one and try it out for yourself to believe it.
